name: amigurumi tik tok bee
yarn_weight: any gauge - designed for any gauge
notes:
i am here to help! if you have any issues with this pattern i am here to help you get unstuck and finish your item. buy with confidence.

make this amigurumi bee toy in different sizes by using the same pattern with 3 different yarn weights and hook sizes. the large size is the size of a small pillow, the small size is great as a toy. makes the perfect gift for your little one or a great baby shower gift for an expecting mom, perfect to decorate any nursery or kids' room.


crochet level: easy - you need to be able to read a crochet pattern and know the basic stitches.
format: pdf file, pattern written row by row in us terms with side notes and photo tutorial and link to the step by step video.
language: english only
video tutorials: yes
sizes:
small: 13cm long by 9cm in diameter (dk yarn #3)
medium: 17cm long by 12cm in diameter (aran yarn, #4)
large: 26cm long by 20cm in diameter (super bulky yarn, #6)
material needed: yellow - 0.5 | white- 0.5 | black - 0.5 in your choice of yarn weight
hook: s: 3.5mm, m: 5mm & l: 8mm

pattern will be available for instant download upon payment
